Title: Ham
Writer: Josh Thomas, Liz Doran (additional writing), Thomas Ward (additional writing), Hannah Gadsby (additional writing)
Actors: Josh Thomas, Debra Lawrance, Denise Drysdale, Thomas Ward
Plot: Mum is admitted into a private hospital, and struggles to accept her fate. Patrick has a party. Mum leaves the hospital and goes to find Josh. When Josh takes her back he meets her fellow patients, Hannah and Ginger.
